subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Clint Dempsey scored the game’s only goal Wednesday as the United States defeated Italy in an international friendly in Genoa for America’s first win in 11 games over 78 years against the Azzurri.
snippet: Clint Dempsey scored the game’s only goal Wednesday as the United States defeated Italy in an international friendly in Genoa for America’s first win in 11 games over 78 years against the Azzurri.
